about.subtitle: MEET TABATA
about.title:
Precision nutrition
for real health
and top-level
performance
about.text: I'm Tábata Vitorino — a two-time Olympic athlete and health professional with over 21 years of firsthand experience in high-performance sports. My journey was shaped by training alongside some of the best coaches in the world, combining science, discipline, and elite practice. Today, I use this expertise to transform lives, delivering performance, health, and aesthetics with strategy, precision, and real results. If you're ready to evolve, you're in the right place.

whyChoose.title: WHY CHOOSE ME
whyChoose.subtitle: You'll be guided by an Olympic athlete who combines science, practical experience, and personalized strategies to deliver real results in health, aesthetics, and performance.

cards.leanMass: Modern strategies to maintain your lean mass
cards.autonomy: Educational approach to develop nutritional autonomy

results.subtitle: Real transformations built through strategy, consistency, and professional guidance. Here, you can see the impact of a method that combines science, discipline, and Olympic-level experience.

items.name: Susan Poneman
items.content: As an Olympic athlete, Tabata brings a elite focus, unique insight, and tremendous inspiration to her work as a personal trainer and nutrition expert. Her energy and attention to detail are amazing. I always feel coached not only by a world-class athlete but by someone who truly cares about my success. Tabata is one-of-a-kind and I give her my highest recommendation!

items.name: Jonatas Yasumoto
items.content: Purpose and consistency are the foundation of Tábata's work. As both a patient and a student, I experienced this foundation through the results I achieved — more than 30 kg lost and at least 10 years regained in rejuvenation. Forever grateful!

items.name: Fabiana Cristina
items.content: Working with Tábata completely changed my relationship with my body, with food, and with myself. It wasn't just weight loss — it was a real transformation, both physical and mental. Today I feel strong, confident, and in control. This work changes lives.

items.name: Maria Rafaela
items.content: Tábata doesn't just guide you — she walks alongside you. Her method goes far beyond diet and training. Through her work, I gained discipline, confidence, and results that finally make sense.

items.name: Maria Calle
items.content: I had high cholesterol and type 2 diabetes. With the guidance of nutritionist Tábata, I was able to bring my lab results back to normal within just a few months. I learned how to improve my eating habits consciously, without giving up the pleasure of eating.

items.name: Romário Oliveira
items.content: It wasn't just about eating better or exercising more — it was about changing behavior. With Tábata's guidance, I was able to control my binge eating, rebuild my self-esteem, and move my life forward, including earning a promotion at work.

consultation.title: Ready to evolve? Schedule your consultation.
